name: Dark Hunger
description:
Why not be the monster, for once?

Dark Hunger is a short 2D top-down game created for the Weekly Game Jam (week 128), where you get to be the monster! Slither through the shadows, sneak up on your prey, and eat up! Don't get spotted, though, as your prey will most likely make a break for it!

Though the game teaches you the controls, here they are, for reference:

  • WASD: Move (8-directional)
  • J: Dash
